name: European Cargo Alliance
goal:
The European Cargo Alliance represents the interests of European air cargo carriers. It is a grouping of air cargo carriers sharing common interests and goals and its members include three of Europe’s largest air cargo operators- ASL Aviation Group; Cargolux Group; DHL Express. Its objectives are:

(a) to promote and protect the interests of the air cargo carriers in Europe;

(b) to promote and improve connectivity within and between European countries, and between European countries and other third countries, by fostering the development of a competitive air cargo transportation activity in Europe and beyond;

(c) to contribute to resolving, reducing or eliminating any regulatory issues and problems affecting the interests of the providers or customers of air cargo transportation services on a scientific, technical, environmental and institutional level, generally to contribute to improve regulations and eliminate problems and discrepancies created by these regulations;

(d) to promote the legitimate co-operation between its members on public policy matters of common interest;

(e) to advise and assist all members and associate members in regard to matters relevant to the work of the Association
euInitiatives: External aviation affairs and negotiations with third countries, customs matters, security matters
